column1: #Text=Synthesis of Functionalized Copolymer (10) of Butyl Rubber with 7 Mol % Isoprene Units

#Text=[0089] Unpurified butyl rubber containing 7 mol % isoprene (0.2 g, 0.25 mmol of isoprene units) was dissolved in dry toluene (10 mL). m-Chloroperoxybenzoic acid (0.21 g, 1.25 mmol) was dissolved in 13 mL dry toluene, and then this solution was added to the rubber solution.
#Text=The resulting mixture was stirred overnight at room temperature.
#Text=After evaporation of the solvent in vacuo, the product was precipitated in acetone/toluene (2:1) 3 times.

#Text=The resulting epoxidized rubber 8 was dried under vacuum (Yield=92%). .sup.1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl.sub.3): .delta. 2.77 ppm (t, 1H, J=5.8 Hz), .delta. 1.43 (s, CH.sub.2polyisobutylene, 26H), .delta. 1.12 ppm (s, CH.sub.3polyisobutylene, 78H).
#Text=b) Synthesis of 4-nitrophenyl carbonate activated butyl rubber (10)
#Text=[0090] Epoxidized butyl rubber 8 (0.17 g, 0.2 mmol of epoxidized units) was dissolved in dry toluene (6 mL).
#Text=An aqueous HCl solution (37%, 20 .mu.L, 0.2 mmol) was added to the epoxidized butyl rubber solution and the reaction was stirred for 1 hour at room temperature to form 9.
#Text=Next, 4-nitrophenyl chloroformate (0.62 g, 3.1 mmol) was added to the reaction mixture followed by pyridine dropwise (0.30 mL, 3.6 mmol).
#Text=The reaction mixture was stirred 2 hours at room temperature.

#Text=Pyridine salts were then removed by filtration and the resulting solution was precipitated with acetone twice (2:1, acetone/toluene) to obtain functionalized copolymer (10) (Yield=89%). .sup.1H NMR (400 MHz, CDCl.sub.3): .delta. 8.28 (d, 2H, J=8.5 Hz), 7.40 (d, 2H, J=8.5 Hz), 5.28 (s, 1H), 5.13 ppm (s, 1H), 5.03 (s, 1H), 1.43 (s, CH.sub.2polyisobutylene, 26H), 1.12 ppm (s, CH.sub.3polyisobutylene, 78H).
